title: Introduction to C Programming
details: Learn the fundamentals of C programming, including syntax, data types, basic algorithms, memory management, and debugging techniques.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore the fascinating world of algorithms, their design, and analysis for problem-solving. Gain insights into algorithmic paradigms and advanced optimization techniques.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Master C++ programming for data structures and algorithms (DSA). Learn about advanced C++ features, template metaprogramming, and STL for solving complex problems.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Learn essential data structures such as arrays, linked lists, trees, and their applications in building efficient algorithms and organizing data effectively.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Discover object-oriented programming (OOP) in Python and its applications in software design, including encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism.

title: Software Engineering
details: Learn software development methodologies, best practices, and agile project management. Dive into software architecture, testing, and quality assurance.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Get hands-on experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud computing. Explore cloud architecture, DevOps practices, and cost optimization strategies.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Learn database design and management with MySQL. Understand relational database concepts, query optimization, and data modeling.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Develop advanced problem-solving skills in various domains, including algorithmic problem-solving, system design, and optimization strategies.
